name: Door of death
description:
Ever wondered what it's like to be a door? Me neither, but now you can experience it anyways.

Play as the Door of death tm that, unlike normal subway doors, do not automatically stop closing if something is between them...or someone. Use this power to let humans escape from zombies, before you crush them. You are probably wondering if I mean the humans or zombies here. The answer is both. Be the door of death tm!

Controls: left mouse button

This game was made for the 1-Button Jam 2022. Actually the game is the result of a dumb talk in the subway that I took way too seriously. It just so happened to fit the theme of the game jam and I got persuaded submit the door of death tm to it.
